fileCleanup.title: Automated file cleanup
fileCleanup.description: Enabling this will delete application binaries for files which are not in the <n> recent uploads per project. Files for which the deletion is processed will be marked as inactive. Files marked as inactive will not allow future scans to be performed on it.

dynamicScan.title: Dynamic Scan
dynamicScan.warning: Make sure you perform all the actions in the App, there are high chances that the scanner might mark the risk as passed
dynamicScan.deviceSettingsWarning: Please ensure the mobile device settings remain unchanged during the dynamic scan. Altering device settings outside your application can cause the scanner to malfunction. Kindly refrain from actions such as updating the OS, disconnecting from WiFi, performing factory resets, uninstalling apps or changing system settings.
dynamicScan.preferredDeviceNotAvailable: Preferred device type and OS is not available.
dynamicScan.allDevicesAreAllocated: All Devices are currently being used please try again in sometime.
dynamicScan.apiScanDescription: During dynamic scan network traffic made by the app, filtered by the below provided API endpoints will be recorded. Currently traffic capturing is not supported for the apps that employ SSL pinning.
dynamicScan.apiScanUrlFilterTooltipText: Specify host names for filtering network requests during the dynamic scan. If left empty, all requests will be captured.

manual.title: Request Manual Scan
manual.description: We need some additional information in order to request for a manual scan
manual.appQuestion1: What would you like us to do in case some features cannot be accessed or are not live on the application?
manual.appQuestion1Answer1: Proceed with the scan & mention the features that were not scanned in the report. We will rescan it later.
manual.appQuestion1Answer2: Halt the scan, contact us & then proceed with the complete application scan.

features.trackers: Trackers - Gain visibility into trackers that your development teams or third party app developers may have embedded in your applications.
features.dangPerms: Dangerous Permissions - Identify any dangerous permissions being requested by your applications.
features.pii: PII - Uncover PII leaks both in the app binary and over the network calls. (Upcoming feature)
features.geoLoc: Geo Location - Identify if your app is accessing servers located in countries/regions perceived to be dangerous (Upcoming feature)

reportModule.turnOnSettingsHeaderText: Turn ON the Report Generation feature from Organization Settings
reportModule.userReportsDescription: Generate reports related to user activities
reportModule.whatDoYouWantToLearn: What do you want to learn from this report?
reportModule.aiDataAccess: What data does the AI access?
reportModule.aiDataProtection: How is your data protected from security threats?
reportModule.aiDataAccessDescription: The AI (LLM) does not have direct access to your scan or user data. Instead, it uses a limited and abstracted data blueprint that helps it understand the structure of the data.
reportModule.aiDataUsageDescription: Your data is never accessed or processed by the AI. The AI only uses a sanitized, high-level model (blueprint) to interpret your queries and guide report generation. No sensitive or private data is used for any other purpose.

aiDataProtectionList.item1: The AI cannot access your data, unless identifiers like namespace, file ID, or username are explicitly included in your prompt. Even in such cases, it can only use this info to hand over to the data processing layer to get the relevant details. The LLM doesn't have any access to the database containing your data.
aiDataProtectionList.item2: It has no knowledge of internal logic or database structure beyond the provided blueprint.
aiDataProtectionList.item3: Our database access is tightly controlled, and the system architecture ensures that only predefined, read-only queries are allowed through the AI layer.

sbomModule.pastSbomAnalysesDescription: Here you see all SBOM reports related to the {projectName} project.

appScanEmptyText.title: No SBOM Analyses
appScanEmptyText.description: No SBOM analyses has been done for this application (Project). Kindly upload the app to initiate an SBOM analysis

sbomScanStatusError.title: SBOM Analysis Error
sbomScanStatusError.description: SBOM analysis for this application could not be completed due to some issues. Kindly reupload and check again. If this issue persists, please reach out to the support team.

sbomScanStatusProgress.title: SBOM Analysis in Progress
sbomScanStatusProgress.description: SBOM Analysis for this application is currently in progress. Please wait for a few moments for it to be completed.

sbomModule.sbomOverview: SBOMs provide visibility into the software supply chain, helping your organization identify potential vulnerabilities and security risks.

sbomFeatures.oneClickAnalysis: Get the SBOM analysis done for your mobile applications, with just 1 click.
sbomFeatures.uncoverVulnerabilities: Quickly uncover vulnerable and outdated components to take corrective action.
sbomFeatures.componentInsights: Get valuable insights related to the components, such as the Author, License, and the Version used.

sbomModule.sbomContactMessage: Thanks for showing interest in SBOM. Our team will get back to you.
sbomModule.componentDetailsDescription: View additional information related to each component.
sbomModule.componentDescription: View the list of components detected in your application.

componentListEmptyText.title: No Components Found
componentListEmptyText.description: No components could be detected for this application. Kindly reupload and check again. If this issue persists, please reach out to the support team.

knownVulnerabilitiesEmptyText.title: No Vulnerability Found
knownVulnerabilitiesEmptyText.description: We could not locate any known vulnerabilities associated with this component, at this point in time.

sbomModule.sbomAppDescription: Identify the components used in your mobile application and any vulnerabilities associated with it.

sbomAppEmptyText.title: No SBOM Applications
sbomAppEmptyText.description: Uh, Oh!. Looks like you have not been granted access to any application (Project) or there have been no applications uploaded yet. Please contact the 'Owner' in your organization for more details.

scanTriggeredAutomatically: Scan triggered automatically on app upload.
scheduleDynamicscanDesc: Schedule an automated dynamic scan for this file by clicking on the button below. Once scheduled, the system will use the Active Scenarios on the Project Settings page to execute the Automated DAST. It may take up to 24hrs for this to be completed.

storeknox.initiateUploadComingSoon: App Store integration will be released soon. For now, please upload the app binary.

storeknox.monitoringDetailsTableEmpty: This application could not be located on the Play Store or App Store.
storeknox.actionsInfo: Initiate Upload button will be available in instances where an Unscanned version of the app was detected.
storeknox.actionHeaderInfo: Your request to add an app will be sent to all Owners in your Organization. If approved, you will be able to view the app in your Organizations Inventory.
storeknox.actionHeaderInfoOwner: Click on the '+' icon to add the app to your Organization's Inventory.
storeknox.appAddedToInventory: {appName} App has been moved to App Inventory

storeknox.availableColumnInfo: This column indicates whether the app is present only on Appknox or Storeknox or on both products
storeknox.description: Discover your apps, Maintain a centralized inventory and Monitor them on stores.
storeknox.disclaimerHeader: Intended solely for your organization's apps.
storeknox.disclaimerBody:
Discovery module is strictly meant for identifying and inventorying apps that your organization owns or has rights to. Responsibility for unauthorized tracking and any liability that results from such an action rests entirely with your organization.

Appknox will not be liable for any misuse involving apps outside of your organization's ownership.
storeknox.discoverDescription: Search for your apps on Google Play Store and Apple App Store and add them to your Organizations Inventory for automated monitoring.
storeknox.infoIndicatorWhitelabelText: This app is not available on VAPT and Store Monitoring
storeknox.noPendingItemsDescription: You have reviewed all the requests that was raised by your users.
storeknox.noResultFoundDescription: We couldn't find any results for your search keyword. Try refining your search by checking for typos, using different keywords, or being more specific.
storeknox.noRequestedAppsFoundDescription:
You have not requested any apps to be added to your organization's inventory.
Use the Discovery page to search for apps and raise a request.
storeknox.noInventoryAppsFoundDescription: You have not added any apps to your organization's inventory.
storeknox.searchForAppsDescription: Use the search bar on this page to look for apps that belong to your Organization and add them to your Inventory for automated monitoring
storeknox.searchQuery: Search by app name, developer name, namespace or support email
storeknox.smIndicatorText: This App is part of Store Monitoring
storeknox.title: Storeknox
storeknox.appNotPartOfAppknox: This app isn't in your organization's Appknox account - Upload now to detect and fix vulnerabilities!
storeknox.inventoryDescription: This contains all the mobile applications that belong to your Organization. You can add more apps to your inventory by using the Discovery module.
storeknox.appNotInAppknoxHeader: This app has never been uploaded to Appknox.
storeknox.appNotInAppknoxDescription: It is strongly recommended to upload this to Appknox to perform the Vulnerability Assessment.

storeknox.monitoringResultsPendingWithMonitoringOf: Use the toggle on this page to enable monitoring of this app. Once done, come back to this page after some time to view the results.

storeknox.addVAPTPrjsByDefaultToggleDesc2: , to your Inventory - Turning this toggle ON would automatically add any new app that was uploaded to perform VAPT, to your Organization's Inventory.
